headline: Biogen Hits 52-Week High, Alzheimer's Drug Sales Jump
summary: Biogen Inc. (NASDAQ:BIIB) on Friday reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings, with adjusted EPS of $1.99, beating the consensus of $1.59. The Alzheimer's drug maker reported revenues of $2.28 billion, beating the consensus of $2.20 billion, down 7% on a reported and constant currency basis.
